misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a force to be reckoned with on the greens, hails from the esteemed Hirsala Golf club. Known for his intense focus and, off the record, a colorful vocabulary that would make a sailor blush, Simo is a prominent figure in the Hector Trophée circuit.

With nine past appearances under his belt and an impressive three Hector Trophée victories, Simo's competitive spirit is undeniable. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his determination suggests it is only a matter of time before he claims individual glory.

Preparing for his tenth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Simo has made a significant change to his arsenal, adopting a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter. This strategic move reflects his unwavering commitment to improvement and his relentless pursuit of excellence. Opponents would be wise to watch out for Simo in the 2025 tournament.
